search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Upnify (upnify.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Upnify can be found at this URL: [https://upnify.com/en/crm/pricing.html](https://upnify.com/en/crm/pricing.html)【3:0†source】.

Frequently Asked Questions

With Upnify, my organization (which operates with independent offices) has achieved a high level of customization in terms of image, communication points, action, and contact with prospects. We maintain consistency in our process, facilitating analysis, measurement, and decision-making. I consider it the most successful CRM in Latin America.

Pepe Villacís, Business Coach at Action Coach®

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is per user per month, billed annually. Discounts are applied for annual billing.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Advanced plan with priority support and all PRO features.
Most popular plan with API access and AI insights.
Entry-level plan with essential sales automation features.

additional_fees.fee_description: Optional services are available at additional cost.
